net.corda.flows

Class Service.TransactionParts

  • net.corda.flows.NotaryFlow.Service.TransactionParts
  • Enclosing class:
    NotaryFlow.Service

    public static class Service.TransactionParts

    The minimum amount of information needed to notarise a transaction. Note that this does not include any sensitive transaction details.

    • Constructor Summary
